actions: Cools Summerheat while remaining gentle on the Stomach.
Relieves Summerheat, removes Dampness and controls bleeding.
Clears Summerheat, generates Fluids, promotes urination and cools Lung and Stomach Heat.
With He Ye, Bian Dou Hua and Jin Yin Hua, for Exterior conditions in the summer.
Unblocks the channels and collaterals, dispels Wind and expels Phlegm.
Relieves Summerheat and stops bleeding from Heat in the Blood.

syndromes: Summerheat injuring the Qi level of the Lung channel

manifestations.pulse: Maybe soft or Soft and rapid

contraindications: This formula is insufficient for severe cases of Summerheat.

notes: This formula may be taken in lower doses as a tea throughout the summer to prevent Summerheat.

modifications.purpose: an unproductive cough with a clear, high pitch
Summerheat in the Exterior and Dampness in the Interior with fever, chills, no thirst and hematemesis
